system
Class MapObject

java.lang.Object
  system.MapObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
LivingUnit, NonLivingUnit
public abstract class MapObject
extends java.lang.Object

The class MapObject represents all objects on the map. It contains eleven methods and sets the position of the objects on the map as well as load their respective images.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Brett Leighton, Leotard Niyonkuru, Marc-Andre Cataford, Mete Kemertas, Martin Zhang

Constructor Summary

          Sets the map objects position and sets the object to alive.
